mets:xmlData.dc:subject: Foster, Constance
Harris, Wendy
Lenny, Candy
Ramos, Cristina
Tedesco, Pamela
Tournament of Roses (1967)
Santa Anita Park (Arcadia, Calif.)
mets:xmlData.dc:description: 1967 Arcadia Rose Court at Santa Anita Park Racetrack stand in front of a horsedrawn carriage. Driver is seated in white suit and white hat with black band. From left to right, princess wearing cream colored coat, navy blue handbag; princess wearing red suit; unidentified man; Queen Cristina Ramos wearing tiara and black and white plaid suit, red shoes; two more unidentified men, princess wearing fuchsia suit and white fishnet stockings; princess wearing blue suit and red hat. Not in any particular order, the princesses are Wendy Harris, Constance Foster, Pamela Tedesco, and Candy Lenny. San Gabriel Mountains in the background.
mets:xmlData.dc:source: Ruth and Charles Gilb Arcadia Historical Museum "Arcadia Chamber of Commerce" Archive Box
